data.persona: I am a student in the kingdom. I am studying how to create swords for the use by knights. My trade is important for the success of the of battles to keep our kingdom standing.
data.description:
You are in the back room.
The back room holds the texts for the priest. There are a few bookshelfs with many books. There is a desk with some readings on it.
There's a beer glass, a stained glass clock, a sea glass, a looking glass, and some broken glass here.
A squire and a bird are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a magelight.

data.short_motivation: I wish go gain the squire's trust.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to make the squire to agree to teach me.
data.long_motivation: I wish to gain the knowledge of the squire so I can become an excellent sword craftsman.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the squire when he agrees to help you.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wield the metal into a sword.
